description: A healthy and delicious make ahead breakfast with a seasonal twist!
name: Gingerbread Baked Oatmeal Cups with Chocolate Chips
recipeIngredient: 4 cups old fashioned oats, gluten free certified if necessary
1/4 cup coconut sugar or brown sugar
1/3 cup chocolate chips, I like to use mini dairy free chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees F. Add the dry ingredients to a large bowl and mix well until everything is combined. Next, add the wet ingredients and mix again. Stir in the chocolate chips.
Spray a muffin tin with cooking spray and scoop oatmeal mixture in using a large ice cream scoop or a 1/4 measuring cup.
Bake oatmeal cups for 20 minutes, or until cooked through.

video.description: These Gingerbread Baked Oatmeal Cups with Chocolate Chips are a delicious and seasonal make ahead breakfast recipe!  Gluten free and vegan too!  Get the recipe here:https://www.shelikesfood.com/gingerbread-baked-oatmeal-cups-chocolate-chips/
video.name: How to make Gingerbread Baked Oatmeal Cups with Chocolate Chips
